source_objects.description: Become a database expert with these courses ranging from basic SQL to Hadoop and Oracle mastery.
source_objects.title: Database Design & Development

items.title: LEARNING PATH: Java: Data Analysis Made Easy with Java
items.headline: Analyze your data efficiently with Java
objectives_summary: Understand how to evaluate your data with different types of data analysis techniques
Employ Java tools to visualize data in various formats
Understand multimedia data analysis with Java

items.title: SQL Server Developer : SELECT query foundations
items.headline: Learn how to use SELECT, FROM, WHERE, GROUP BY, HAVING and ORDER in SQL Server to retrieve and analyse data
objectives_summary: Querying SQL server databases using the SELECT clause
Joining multiple tables in different ways to combine information
Filtering data to retrieve only the information you need

items.title: How to Design a Database
items.headline: A hands-on approach
objectives_summary: Design a database from scratch
Microsoft Access
Queries and SQL

items.title: Reliability and Resilience on AWS
items.headline: Guide to achieve resilience and reliability on AWS
objectives_summary: Deploy EC2 Auto scaling for web server instances.
How to build and maintain EC2 images.
Design Application Load Balancing Services that scale across availability zones.

items.title: Apache Kafka Concepts - For the Absolute Beginner
items.headline: Learn Apache Kafka - Architecture, Core Concepts, Key Components, Kafka CLI, Kafka API, Java Producers and Consumers
objectives_summary: Understand the basics of Apache Kafka - Architecture and Core Concepts
Learn Core Components of Kafka - Clusters, Brokers, Topics, Partitions, Messages, Offsets, Producers, Consumers, Consumer Groups
Setup and Start Kafka Development Environment in Local Machine

items.title: How to create Databases and Tables in Microsoft SQL Server
items.headline: Learn how to create databases and tables
objectives_summary: Setup SQL Server
Install SQL Server Management Studio
Connect to SQL Server using SSMS

items.title: Learning Path:Java: Data Structures & Algorithms with Java 9
items.headline: Unleash the power of Java 9 to master data structures and algorithms from scratch
objectives_summary: Understand the fundamentals of algorithms, data structures, and complexity measurement
Find out what general-purpose data structures are, including arrays, linked lists, double-ended linked lists, and circular lists
Gain a better understanding of the concept of trees, queues, and graphs

items.title: MongoDB for Beginners: Build a MEAN Stack App

visible_instructors.job_title: Microsoft MVP, Technical Consultant and Corporate Trainer
visible_instructors.title: Shailendra Chauhan
visible_instructors.name: Shailendra

items.headline: Learn NoSQL concepts, Querying Collections, Validations, Relationships, Aggregation, Map-reduce, MEAN Stack App and More
objectives_summary: NoSQL Concepts
MongoDB Installation and Configuration
Mongo Shell

items.title: Learn the in-demand job of DBA SQL Server(18 hours of class)

visible_instructors.display_name: O.Thuillier | SQL | Postgres | Powershell| MySQL | Python | TSQL Administration,TSQL, and SQL Server performance.

visible_instructors.title: O.Thuillier | SQL | Postgres | Powershell| MySQL | Python | TSQL Administration,TSQL, and SQL Server performance.
visible_instructors.name: O.Thuillier | SQL | Postgres | Powershell| MySQL | Python | TSQL

items.headline: Learn in this 18-hour course how to build a reliable and secure robust SQL server 2019
objectives_summary: Build a robust, reliable, secure, and powerful SQL server.
Approach and deepen the BACKUP and RESTORE (2 hours of lessons)
Address security and privileges  (2 hours of lessons)

items.title: LEARNING PATH: Big Data Analytics and Processing with Spark
items.headline: Leverage the power of Apache Spark to perform efficient data processing and analytics on your data in real-time
objectives_summary: Discover how to write efficient jobs using Apache Spark
Learn to use Pig and Hive in a non-Java way to understand the power of Hadoop
Explore Spark and use it to stream and batch process

items.title: SQL Server Triggers & Views Unpacked: A beginner's guide
items.headline: Learn SQL Server Triggers & Views on Windows, MacOS, and Linux using Azure Data Studio
objectives_summary: The ultimate practical course that help you master SQL Triggers and SQL Views as a beginner.
SQL Queries in this course can be practiced using both Azure Data Studio (or) SQL Server Management Studio(SSMS)
Learn to develop, code, & implement SQL Triggers & SQL Views

items.title: Connect and query SQL Database Server using T-SQL and SSMS
items.headline: Create database objects , query database,backup and restore database
objectives_summary: Setup Microsoft SQL Database Server
Connect to SQL Database Server
Create a database

items.title: Data Acquisition and Manipulation with Python
items.headline: Acquire and analyse data in different formats with the help of Python data analysis tools
objectives_summary: See how to acquire and save different formats of data
Find out how to connect to a database and add information to it
Combine and merge data sets, and manipulate strings using Python

items.title: Design Database Views in SQL Server
items.headline: Learn how to design and implement Database Views in SQL Server
objectives_summary: Designing SQL Server Views
Implementing SQL Server Views
Advanced Database View Techniques

items.title: Practical T-SQL: 300+ quizzes;165 hands-on, useful exercises

visible_instructors.job_title: Microsoft Certified Professional, Consultant and Author
visible_instructors.title: Samuel Osei-Tutu
visible_instructors.name: Samuel

items.headline: Interactive T-SQL Scripting: Learn Transact-SQL (T-SQL) the hands-on way: 390+ quizzes, 165 + hands-on exercises.
objectives_summary: Get started fast: The concepts an terms you need for working with relational database and SQL. How to use the SQL Server Management Studio to work with SQL
Master the SQL that you will use every day. Learn to write SQL statements that retrieve and update the data in a database
Learn to work with inner and outer joins, summary queries, and subqueries...it's all here

items.title: Developing with MongoDB
items.headline: Comprehensive tutorial to help you master the complex querying and advanced data modeling concepts in MongoDB
objectives_summary: How to become immediately productive with MongoDB
How to model your data in MongoDB for optimal performance
How to analyze, optimize, and scale your MongoDB clusters
